statements.select: SELECT TOP 1 T1.USR_ID , T1.USR_PWD , T1.USR_N1ST_NM AS USR_NM , T1.DELT_FLG , T1.CHNL_CD FROM TB_SYS_USR AS T1 WHERE 1=1 AND USR_ID = #USR_ID# AND DELT_FLG = #DELT_FLG# AND CHNL_CD = #CHNL_CD#
SELECT TOP 1 VER_NM , FL_NM , ST_NM , USE_FLG AS DELT_FLG FROM TB_SYS_MOB_UPD_VER WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY CRE_DT DESC
